00025 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT ALIGN_STRUCT(16) FMVector4
00026 {
00027 public:
00028     float x;    
00029     float y;    
00030     float z;    
00031     float w;    
00034     #ifndef _DEBUG
00035     inline FMVector4() {}
00036     #else
00037     inline FMVector4() { x = 123456789.0f; y = 123456789.0f; z = 123456789.0f; w = 123456789.0f; }
00038     #endif 
00039 
00046     inline FMVector4(const float* source, uint32 startIndex = 0) { source = source + startIndex; x = *source++; y = *source++; z = *source++; w = *source; }
00047 
00054     inline FMVector4(const FMVector3& v, float _w) { x = v.x; y = v.y; z = v.z; w = _w; }
00055 
00059     inline FMVector4(const FMVector2& v1, const FMVector2& v2) { x = v1.x; y = v1.y; z = v2.x; w = v2.y; }
00060 
00066     inline FMVector4(float _x, float _y, float _z, float _w) { x = _x; y = _y; z = _z; w = _w; }
00067 
00070     FMVector4(const FMColor& c);
00071 
00078     static FMVector4 FromHSVColor(float hue, float saturation, float value);

00085     FMVector3 ToHSVColor();

00090     inline operator float*() { return &x; }
00091 
00094     inline operator const float*() const { return &x; }
00095 
00102     inline FMVector4& operator =(const float* v) { x = *v; y = *(v + 1); z = *(v + 2); w = *(v+3); return *this; }
00103 
00108     inline void ComponentMinimum(const FMVector4& min) { if (x < min.x) x = min.x; if (y < min.y) y = min.y; if (z < min.z) z = min.z; if (w < min.w) w = min.w; }
00109 
00114     inline void ComponentMaximum(const FMVector4& max) { if (x > max.x) x = max.x; if (y > max.y) y = max.y; if (z > max.z) z = max.z; if (w > max.w) w = max.w;}

00126 inline FMVector4 operator *(const FMVector4& a, float b) { return FMVector4(a.x * b, a.y * b, a.z * b, a.w * b); }
00127 
00132 inline FMVector4 operator *(float a, const FMVector4& b) { return FMVector4(a * b.x, a * b.y, a * b.z, a * b.w); }
00133 
00138 inline FMVector4 operator +(const FMVector4& a, const FMVector4& b) { return FMVector4(a.x + b.x, a.y + b.y, a.z + b.z, a.w + b.w); }
00139 
00144 inline FMVector4 operator -(const FMVector4& a, const FMVector4& b) { return FMVector4(a.x - b.x, a.y - b.y, a.z - b.z, a.w - b.w); }
00145 
00150 inline FMVector4& operator +=(FMVector4& b, const FMVector4& a) { b.x += a.x; b.y += a.y; b.z += a.z; b.w += a.w; return b; }
00151 
00156 inline FMVector4& operator -=(FMVector4& b, const FMVector4& a) { b.x -= a.x; b.y -= a.y; b.z -= a.z; b.w -= a.w; return b; }
00157 
00162 inline FMVector4& operator *=(FMVector4& b, float a) { b.x *= a; b.y *= a; b.z *= a; b.w *= a; return b; }
00163 
00168 inline FMVector4& operator /=(FMVector4& b, float a) { b.x /= a; b.y /= a; b.z /= a; b.w /= a; return b; }
00169 
00174 inline float operator *(const FMVector4& a, const FMVector4& b) { return a.x * b.x + a.y * b.y + a.z * b.z + a.w * b.w; }

00181 inline bool IsEquivalent(const FMVector4& p, const FMVector4& q) { return IsEquivalent(p.x, q.x) && IsEquivalent(p.y, q.y) && IsEquivalent(p.z, q.z) && IsEquivalent(p.w, q.w); }
00182 inline bool operator==(const FMVector4& p, const FMVector4& q) { return IsEquivalent(p.x, q.x) && IsEquivalent(p.y, q.y) && IsEquivalent(p.z, q.z) && IsEquivalent(p.w, q.w); }
